content:
Nishdhayil ni-nne petta
Paavana kanyakayodoppam
Naathhaa! Devaa! Nalkuka yogyatha nin sthuthi paadaan

Munnam nin-aagamanam
Cholliya nal nibiyarodoppam
Naathhaa! Devaa!...

Dandana pee-dakalletta
Sahadaa maudyaanarumoppam
Naathhaa! Devaa!...

Parumala maar greegoriyosu
Deevannaasyosu ivaroppam
Naathhaa! Devaa!...

Vishvaasatthaal parudeesaa
neeyarulliya moshdaavoppam
Naathhaa devaa! ...

Anavaratha sthuthi thalpararaam ambaradoothanmaaroppam
Naathhaa! Devaa!...

Nin janani mariyaam- snaapakanaam yoohaanon
Ennivararththhikkum- ninnod, nyangallkkaayu krpa cheytheedaname.

items.content: Janam: - kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheythu nyangalle sahaayikkaname.

/tanaadyantanum, sakalatthinteyum nirmmaathaavumaaya daivame! Ninakku sthuthi. Ninte svaroopatthil nee manushyane srshdichu. Avan paapamcheythu veenupoyathinte shesham ezhunnettu varuvaanum, sakalatthinteyum adhikaariyum sakalattheyum parishodhikkunnavanum neeyaakunnuvennu arinyu ninte adukkalekku thiriyunnathinum, avante santaanangall nashdappettupokaathirikkunnathinumaayi avanu nee achaaram nalki. Daivame! Ippoll nyangallude sangkadashabdam kellkkaname. Ninakku ee neratthum ellaa perunnaallukallilum, nerangallilum, kaalangallilum, nyangallude aayushkaalasleebaamokkeyilum, sthuthiyum bahumaanavum nyangall samarppikkum. Bkulahun yaummo aammeen.

Athyulkrshda parimallavaasanayaayirikkunna kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi, ninakku sthothram. Naathhaa! Ninte kalpanayaal agniyil urukkappettu ninte daivathvatthinu dhoopamaayi samarppikkappeduvaan, bhoomiyilninnu nalla aushadhangalleyum parimallavargangalleyum nee ullavaakki, ava ninakkaavashyamaayittalla; ennaalo nyangallude parimalladhoopam moolam nyangallkku paapaparihaaramundaakkuvaan nyangallude aavashyatthinaayittathre. Kartthaave! Ninte karunayaalum dayayaalum nyangallude sthothangalleyum praarththhanakalleyum, ninte preethikkum nyangallude punyatthinumaayi kaikkollllaname. Nyangallude ee dhoopam ninte pallllikallkkum bhavanangallkkum dayaraakallkkum vendiyum, purohithanmaarkkum balipeedhangallkkum vendiyum ninte bahumaanaarththham samarppikkappedunnu. Randaamatthe svargamaayittheernna, ninne vahicha nirmmalayum shuddhimathiyum aayirikkunna ninte maathaavaaya kanyaka martthamariyaaminte apekshakall moolavum, deerghadarshimaarudeyum shleehanmaarudeyum, sahadenmaarudeyum, maudyaananmaarudeyum brahmachaarikalludeyum, vineethanmaarudeyum, nompukaarudeyum, vilaapakkaarudeyum, vrathakkaarudeyum praarththhanakall moolavum, nyangallodu krpa cheyyaname. Ninte thirushareera rakthangallil sambandhich, ninte prathyaashayil nidrapraapichirikkunna vishvaasikallaaya nyangallude marichupoyavarkku nalla aashvaasavum mahattharamaaya punaruththhaanavum nalkaname. Nyangallum avarum ninte valathubhaagatthuninnu ninte kaarunyam kand, ninakkum, ninte pithaavinum, vishuddha roohaaykkum, ippozhumellaayppozhum sthuthiyum, sthothravum samarppikkumaaraakaname. Hosho

content: Daivatthilninnu kadangallkku parihaaravum, paapangallkku mochanavum, randu lokangallilum ennekkum naam kaikkollllumaaraakatte. Aammeen.

Devaadheeshaa!! Naathhaa! Thirumumpil
Nyangallanachoree - parimalladhoopatthaal paapam
Neekkaname pizha pokkaname.
Sleebaayaal rakshichavanaam
Jeevasuthaa! Karunaadivase
Nin valamaayu nyangalle nirtthaname.

Nayanaagocharamaam - uyaratthil ninnum
Ninmaahaathmyatthe thaazhtthi svahithatthaal naranaay
Durbbalaraamaadaamyarude
Aadhi vyaadhikalle theertthon
Thaathajane svayamudbhoothaa!
Sthuthi naathhaa! Thava maanam dhanyam.

Seenaayu giri nin - savidhe vira poondu.
Naathhaa! Deveshaa! - giri vaaridhi dharanaam ninne
Kanyakayaam mariyaamenti
Vezhchapedaathavall garbhiniyaay,
Vachanaatheetham prasavichu.
Thalsmrthiye-vishruthamaakkaname.

Kanyakamariyaame! - shlommo ninnodu cho-
Nnathyunnathadoothan - nee perum raajeshvarane
Prasavicheedum vezhchavinaa
Srshdikall than prabhayaam raviye
Vaazh/u200bvezhumamme! Kanyakayaayu
Prasavicholl nee saubhaagyavathi.

Unnatharaajyamathum - shaashvathajeevithavum
Nirmmalaraarjikkum - satthamamashihaa bhakthanmaa-
Rarhikkunna mahaabhaagyam
Jadanethram darshikkukayo
Shravanam kellkkukayo hrdayam
Therukayo cheythittillethum.

Sahaderothunnu,- supriya shuddhasuthan
Svakaraajye nyangall-kkekeedum mudi shaashvathavum
Prathidaanam samrakshithavum
Eritheevaall marddithar nyangall-
Kkaashvaasam mashihaayishdar-
Kkarulliyathaam parudeesayilekum.

Mannavane! Mashihaa! Sathatham thavakarunaa-
Vaathilil muttunnen - dhanikaa nin nidhinilayatthee-
Nnekaname krpayum vaazh/u200bvum,
neeyen gathi, thunacheyyuka nin
Saakshiye lajithanaakkaruthe,
Sharanavumen-aashrayavum neeye.

Raajyatthin vaathil - cheriyathumaa maargam
Veethi kuranyathumaa-naavazhi gamanam kaamkshippo-
Nathyuthsaahamavashyam thaan.
Alasatha lesham baadhichaal
Ashubhavazhikku vashamvadanaayu
Svaathmatthe-svayame nihanikkum

Mashihaayude rooshmaa - maamodeesaayaal
Sampraapichoraayu - thrppaavana thanu bhakshichu
Punyaninam paanam cheythor
Poozhiyil ninnum thaan moolam
Praananoderi dhoolli kuda-
Nyathi thejo-vasthram chaarttheedum.

items.content: Thante varavine munnariyippaan pravaachakanmaareyum, thante avathaaratthinu kanyakamariyaamineyum, rakshaakaravum jeevan nalkunnathumaaya suvishesham prasamgippaan shleehanmaareyum, ariyippukaareyum, vishvaasasthhireekaranatthinuvendi rakthasaakshikallaakuvaan sahadenmaareyum, thirusabhaye samrakshichu bharippaan purohithanmaareyum, theranyeduttha daivame! Avarude ormma divasam ayogyaraaya nyangall ninte thirusannidhiyil samarppikkunna dhoopam kaikkollllaname. Avarude praarththhana mukhaantaram lokatthil samaadhaanavum, thiru sabhaykku abhivrddhiyum, sabhaamgangallkku parishuddhajeevithavum kaivarutthaname. Nyangall avarude praarththhanayil aashrayichukond, vishvaasasthhirathayode jeevaparyantam punyaparisheelanatthil jeevikkumaaraakaname. Nyangallum nyangallude marichupoyavarum, ninte parishuddhanmaarodonnichu ninte mokshatthil aanandichu ninakkennum sthuthi paadumaaraakaname. Hosho ... Aammeen

content:
Dyuthi udayam-cheythen kartthaave!
Koorirull neengumpoll ninne
Kooppunnu-gaganam-dharayennee
Druthamundaayoru sodarimaar
/tneerinmeethe vaanidamo-
/tnnaparam neerinnaadhaaram
/tnimishamuyarnnoru manavarayaam
Oyaaraayathamaayu maddhye
Sthuthyam srshdividhaanam the.

Nirmmalamaam-udare nirmmalamaayu
Vannu vasichoru nirmmalanaam
Aathmajane-preshippichavanaam
Nirmmalathaathan samsthuthyan.
/tthan saamyam naam poondiduvaan
/tnammude saamyamavan poondu;
/tnamme than pithrsutharaakki
Paavanaroohaayodu cherppaan
Maanavaroopam svayamettaan.

Praarththhippaan daivatthin mumpil
Mariyaam ninneedunnera-
Tthagnijvaalaavrthanaam doothan
Savidhe chennura cheythevam.
/traajathanoojan mevumathaam
/tmanimandirame shlommo the,
/tninnilamarnneedum dhanavaan
Kshaamam janathaykkaattiduvaan
Ninnagathithvam maayichaan.

Bhaagyanidhee! Mariyaame! Daiva-
Praanaathmajane pettolle!
Bhaagyanidhee! Vaanijanaavaasam
Cheythoru bhooshithamaam nauke!
/tambarashilpiye ettenti
/tvrathashuddhyaa pettoramale!
/tnisthulamaam manimandirame!
Bhaagyam the, ninnil jaatham
Cheythonaam naathhan dhanyan.

'nyaan sathya-prabha’ ennudayon than
Antevaasikallodothi;
iprabhayil-chernnu nadappone
Irull pidi koodaa, mashihaa than
/tprabhayil chernnu nadannoraam
/tshleehanmaarkkathi saubhaagyam
/tkandaalum thal smrthiyengum
Kondaadeedunnathighosham
Thal praarththhana nammallkkabhayam.

Jeevakaram mrthikaramennevam
Kandirusaranikall sahadenmaar
Noothanamaam-jeevithamaarjippaan;
Durghadamaargam kaamkshichaar;
/tdushdaathmaavodu padavetti
/tjayamoderi parayunnu:
/taavashyakkaarkkaashrayavum
Bhakthanmaarkkanugaamiyumaam
Kartthaavin naamam dhanyam.

Kshemamoda-ngezhunnalllluka saakshaal
Idayaa! Pandithanaayakane!
Keeppaa pol sabha thannaadhaaram!
Muttum paulosinu samane!
/tnibi nivahatthin priya sahajaa!
/tapposthola samoohasthhaa!
/teliyaa polujvalane!
Yoohaanonpol vrathaparane!
Ninne varichoru sabha dhanya.

Aahvaanam-cheyyum paapikallil
Krpaye vilakkaatthon devaa!
Aardrathayaal kopatthin vadiyum
Thaadanavum neekkeedaname.
/taanandeshvaryangallezhum
/tmaasaabdangalle nalkaname.
/tsleebaayude van rushmaayaal
Viddhvamsikkuka dushdane nin
Aardrathaye vaazhtthum nyangall.

Nin sthuthiyum-haaleluyyaayum
Kartthaave! Nyaan nirttharuthe;
Vidhi neethi-kkayyo cheyyaruthe;
Nyaan paathakiyennariyunnen,
/tsarvva kadangallumaaraanyaal
/tnarakam thaanennavakaasham
/tninne villippaan kazhivenye
Maunam mrthiyaal nyaan pookum
Neekkuka krpayaalenpaapam.

Aashvaasam-smrthiyodu mrtha thaatha
Bhraathaakkallkkekeedaname
Nirtthaname-thaavaka poojakare
Parishuddhanmaarude nirayil
/tsimhaasana samsthhithanaayu nee
/tsatthamare thirayunneram
/tvidhinilaye daya kandetthi
Thaavaka mahimodaya divase
Nin valamaayavar nilkkaname.

Ninnaall sthuthiyodu raajamakall-haa-haa
Nin valamaayu raajabhaaminiyum.

Nayavaan pana pole thallirtthidume haa-haa
Vallarumavan lebanon kaarakil pol.

Makkallilappan krpa cheythu pole-haa-haa
Bhakthanmaaril Daivam krpa cheyyum.

Sthuthi daivatthinnuyaratthil
Than maathaavinnunnathiyum
Mahimaamudi sahadenmaarkkum
Mrtharil karunayumundaaka.

Thaathan shlommo gabreeyel
moolam meleennaa dhanya
/tmariyaaminu nalkappettu
/tthee poondon vaayil thingum shlommo chonnaan naathhan nin
Koode thannudayam ninnil.

Shlommo than nibiyanmaarkkum
Shlommo than shleehanmaarkkum
/tshlommo shlemmo naathhangkal
/tkoorerum sahadenmaarkkum
shlommo than makkall vasikkum
Parishuddhasabhaykkum shlommo.

Naam daivasuthanmaaraavaan
Aayushkaalatthilcholli-
/ttthannatthaathare orkkenam
/tnayavaanmaarpunyappetto-
Ronnichekumavarkkaashvaa-
Sam svarge puthrandaivam.

Maathrvishuddha,smrthisambandham-nalkuka naathhaa!
Thal praarththhanayaal punyamivarkkum mrtharaayorkkum.

Bhaagyavathee! Mariyaame! Nizhalaay-mooshapaninya
Pettiyathaal nee chithreekrthayaay-goodhaarththhatthil.

Pettikkullllil daivikamaayo-redukall pole
Nyastham ninnil sathyam mariyaam-jeevanapoopam.

daaveedinputhriyil ninnum mey-poondoru puthraa!
Nin krpa paaram varshikkanamee-idavakayinmel.

Shuddhan nee aaloho! Haaleluyyaa
Shuddhan nee balavaane! Kuriyelaayisson
Shuddhan nee mrthiheenaa!+krooshettone krpa cheytheedaname

Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname-haaleluyyaa
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyu kanivaal-kuriyelaayison
Kartthaave! Karmmaarththhanakalle ettittavayaal krpa cheytheedaname.
Sthuthyan nee aaloho! Haaleluyyaa
Sthuthyan nee srashdaave! Kuriyelaayisson
Sthuthyan nee paapikalladiyaaril-krpa cheytheedum mashihaa-raajaave!
